questions.question: What does 'Zhan Zhuang' literally translate to in English?
questions.answer: Standing like a post

questions.question: What are the two main objectives of the Zhan Zhuang practice in this learning unit?
choices: Develop root and structure through standing practice
questions.answer: Develop root and structure through standing practice

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a correct alignment for Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: Chest puffed out and shoulders pulled back
questions.answer: Chest puffed out and shoulders pulled back

questions.question: What is the recommended duration for the initial Zhan Zhuang practice in the homework assignment?
questions.answer: 5-10 minutes per day

questions.question: Which of the following is a stage of standing practice in Zhan Zhuang?
questions.answer: Sinking and rooting

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'rooting' concept in Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: To increase flexibility in the legs
questions.answer: To improve balance and stability

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a recommended focus during Zhan Zhuang practice?
questions.answer: Analyzing daily problems

questions.question: What is the correct position for the arms in the basic Zhan Zhuang posture?
choices: Crossed in front of the chest
Hanging naturally at sides or in 'embracing the tree' position
questions.answer: Hanging naturally at sides or in 'embracing the tree' position

questions.question: What is the recommended eye position during Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: Wide open, focusing on a distant point
questions.answer: Softly focused or closed

questions.question: Which of the following is a key aspect of the pelvis and lower back alignment in Zhan Zhuang?
choices: Arching the lower back as much as possible
Pelvis slightly tucked, avoiding excessive arch in lower back
questions.answer: Pelvis slightly tucked, avoiding excessive arch in lower back

questions.question: What is the purpose of journaling inner experiences after Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: To create a record for the instructor
To reflect on and deepen understanding of the practice
To compare experiences with other students
questions.answer: To reflect on and deepen understanding of the practice

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common challenge faced during Zhan Zhuang practice?
questions.answer: Excessive energy surge

questions.question: What is the recommended tongue position during Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: Pressed firmly against the lower teeth
Resting lightly on the roof of the mouth
questions.answer: Resting lightly on the roof of the mouth

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the correct knee position in Zhan Zhuang?
questions.answer: Slightly bent

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'sinking' concept in Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: To lower the body closer to the ground
To cultivate a sense of heaviness in the lower body
To relax the upper body completely
To improve flexibility in the hips
questions.answer: To cultivate a sense of heaviness in the lower body

questions.question: Which of the following is a recommended visualization for enhancing the sense of rooting?
choices: Visualizing roots growing from feet into the earth
Picturing a bright light above the head
Envisioning water flowing through the body
questions.answer: Visualizing roots growing from feet into the earth

questions.question: What is the primary goal of cultivating inner stillness in Zhan Zhuang?
choices: To quiet the mind and develop relaxed awareness
questions.answer: To quiet the mind and develop relaxed awareness

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a stage of Zhan Zhuang practice mentioned in the module?
questions.answer: Rapid energy circulation

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to thoughts during Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: Allow thoughts to pass without engagement
questions.answer: Allow thoughts to pass without engagement

questions.question: Which of the following sensations might indicate qi circulation during Zhan Zhuang practice?
questions.answer: Feelings of warmth or tingling

questions.question: What is the purpose of the partner check-ins during the practice activities?
choices: To compete for the best posture
To check each other's alignments and provide gentle adjustments
To distract each other from the practice
questions.answer: To check each other's alignments and provide gentle adjustments

questions.question: Which of the following is a key aspect of the head and neck alignment in Zhan Zhuang?
choices: Tilting the head back to look at the ceiling
Turning the head side to side continuously
Chin slightly tucked, as if holding a small ball under the chin
Pressing the chin firmly against the chest
questions.answer: Chin slightly tucked, as if holding a small ball under the chin

questions.question: What is the recommended breathing technique during Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: Holding the breath for long periods
Alternating between inhaling and exhaling rapidly
questions.answer: Deep and natural breathing

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a recommended topic for journaling after Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: Plans for the next day's activities
questions.answer: Plans for the next day's activities

questions.question: What is the purpose of the progressive standing challenge in the practice activities?
choices: To see who can stand the longest
To attempt maintaining the posture for increasing durations
questions.answer: To attempt maintaining the posture for increasing durations

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the correct chest position in Zhan Zhuang?
choices: Puffed out as much as possible
Relaxed, neither puffed out nor collapsed
Alternating between puffed out and collapsed
questions.answer: Relaxed, neither puffed out nor collapsed

questions.question: What is the significance of the 'embracing the tree' arm position in Zhan Zhuang?
choices: It mimics hugging a real tree for support
It helps open the chest and regulate energy flow
It strengthens the arm muscles through isometric contraction
questions.answer: It helps open the chest and regulate energy flow

questions.question: Which of the following is a recommended way to address physical discomfort during Zhan Zhuang practice?
choices: Ignore the discomfort and push through
Use the breath to help release areas of tightness
Constantly shift positions to avoid discomfort
questions.answer: Use the breath to help release areas of tightness

questions.question: What is the purpose of the small group discussions after the journaling activity?
choices: To compare who had the best experience
To critique each other's writing style
To share insights and compare experiences
questions.answer: To share insights and compare experiences

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a benefit of regular Zhan Zhuang practice?
questions.answer: Rapid muscle growth
